mapper.sql: musicid, musicname, musicphoto, duration, musicpath, lyricspath, clickrate, downloadrate, uploadtime
mapper.update:
update music
musicname = #{musicname},
musicphoto = #{musicphoto},
duration = #{duration},
musicpath = #{musicpath},
lyricspath = #{lyricspath},
clickrate = #{clickrate},
downloadrate = #{downloadrate},

where musicid = #{musicid}
